title: School board logo should be a font but the one who made it left years ago
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829205158im_/http:/typophile.com/files/OuderraadDeBremLogo%20zwart-op-wit_4282.jpg)

This logo should be a font, but as I said in the title, the one who made it left years ago and they don't have a clue wich font this is.  
If anyone has a clue of wich font this is, or any suggestions for similar fonts, it would be welcome ^^

Thanks in advance!  
Stijn
author: stcoppens

comments.content:
It's called Buxton Sketch and was issued by Microsoft or not.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829205158im_/http:/typophile.com/files/debrem1_5743.jpg)
